definitions.definition: Collectively, those layers of the Earth ’s crust which primarily comprise stratified deposits .

The region of the uppermost atmosphere where temperature increases along with the altitude due to the absorption of solar ultraviolet radiation by ozone . The stratosphere extends from the tropopause (10–15 kilometers) to approximately 50 kilometers, where it is succeeded by the mesosphere .

main_definition: ( geology , obsolete ) Collectively, those layers of the Earth ’s crust which primarily comprise stratified deposits .
secondary_definitions: ( meteorology ) The region of the uppermost atmosphere where temperature increases along with the altitude due to the absorption of solar ultraviolet radiation by ozone . The stratosphere extends from the tropopause (10–15 kilometers) to approximately 50 kilometers, where it is succeeded by the mesosphere .
